snippet.title: FADE-THE FIRST CHAPTER SOULSLIKE RPG- SOLO DEV - MANA GOLEM BOSS CONCEPT
snippet.description:
Made this video to keep track of my first iteration of this boss before I make different forms of it. I want to build it out and make version of it that scale the difficulty based on where its weakness lies.

FADE is officially available on steam here:https://store.steampowered.com/app/14....
Wanna help support the project more? 
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/KnightbyNight...

Interested in seeing more? Wanna alpha demo or to speak more freely on the game? here's a link to the discord community: https://discord.gg/XtwDJnk . Thinking about planning some streaming of the games development so I can show off more: https://www.twitch.tv/knight_by_night
#SOULSLIKE #RPG #ADVENTURE #DEVLOG #UNREALENGINE #KITBASH3D
